alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 4:55PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern La Paz, northwestern Yuma and southeastern Imperial Counties through 545 PM MST/545 PM PDT/... At 455 PM MST/455 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Martinez Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinez Lake and Yuma Proving Ground. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 92 and 94. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 49 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Yuma
